chatbot.welcome: Welcome to BreadBox! How can assist you on your financial journey today?ü§ñüí∞

tutorials.chatTutorial: I am your personal financial assistant. You can ask me questions about your finances, and I will do my best to help you out!
tutorials.bbTutorial: BreadBox is a financial management tool that helps you track your spending, income, and savings in one spot across multiple banks. You can also use it to set financial goals and track your progress. We also provide a chatbot to help you with any questions you may have.
tutorials.continueBBTutorial: For Alpha, we have set up a test account for you to use. Access through settings by clicking the "connect your account" button. Select any banking institution and enter "user_good" and "password_good" for the password when prompted. Enter "1111" for the MFA code and select any bank accounts to link. Agree to terms and conditions. When done, click out and view your transactions, income, and accounts on the dashboard.

chatbot.endConversation: Thank you for chatting with us. Have a great day! ü§ç

userHints.get-started: Here are some hints to get you started
userHints.drag-drop: Drag and drop widgets to rearrange them.
userHints.explore: Explore each widget for financial insights.
userHints.expenses-view: View and manage your expenses in the list.
userHints.expenses-sidebar: Use the sidebar to visually see where the majority of your expenses went for that period.
userHints.finance-data: Access your financial data and reports.
userHints.finance-analyze: Analyze your income, expenses, and savings.

tooltipText.moneyEarned: This widget displays your total money earned.
tooltipText.recentRecurring: Here you can see your recent recurring transactions.
tooltipText.networthSavingsGoal: This widget shows your net worth and savings goal progress.
tooltipText.crypto: Keep track of your cryptocurrency investments here.
tooltipText.cashFlow: Visualize your cash flow with this widget.
tooltipText.expensesList: Manage and view your expenses in this list.
tooltipText.expenseSideBar: Use the sidebar to filter and categorize your expenses.
tooltipText.totalInvestedNetEarned: See your total invested amount and net earnings.
tooltipText.assetDetails: Get detailed information about your assets.
tooltipText.portfolioDiversity: Analyze the diversity of your investment portfolio.
tooltipText.investmentGoals: Set and track your investment goals with this widget.

signup_login.signup-msg: Sign Up to BreadBox to get started immediately
signup_login.footer: Made with love by the BreadBox Team - GUI 2 2024 Spring Project
